mapper.insert: INSERT INTO turnover (table_id, checkout, first_table_id, discount) VALUES (#{tableId}, #{checkout}, #{firstTableId}, #{discount})
mapper.update: UPDATE turnover SET table_id=#{tableId}, discount=#{discount}, checkout=#{checkout}, updated=now() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, table_id, discount, checkout FROM turnover WHERE id=#{id}
